patthana8.64:1.1_0: Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.64:2.1_0: Nanapītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.64:3.1_0: Napītisahagatañca nanapītisahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.64:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
